com.koalog.util.db
Class DBMgr.QueryContext

java.lang.Object
  com.koalog.util.db.DBMgr.QueryContext
Enclosing class:
DBMgr
public class DBMgr.QueryContext
extends java.lang.Object

An encapsulation of the context required to perform a query. The idea behind this encapsulation is to use connection pools.

          Default constructor.

Constructor Detail

DBMgr.QueryContext

public DBMgr.QueryContext()
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
Default constructor. Creates a new connection and a new statement.

Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - when the connection to the database cannot be established.
